title: Process Orbitrap Iso Data
text: goal isoorbi R package help process isotopocule measurements Orbitrap Iso mass spectrometer. expects .isox files created IsoX input.

title: Process Orbitrap Iso Data
code: # To install from CRAN install.packages("isoorbi")

title: Process Orbitrap Iso Data
code: library(isoorbi)  orbi_read_isox(filepath)

title: Process Orbitrap Iso Data
text: encounter clear bug, please file issue minimal reproducible example GitHub. questions discussion, please use isoorbi slack workspace.

title: Process Orbitrap Iso Data
text: get bug fix use latest features development version isoorbi GitHub.
code: # install the development version  install.packages("devtools")  devtools::install_github("isoverse/isoorbi")

what: isoorbi: Process Orbitrap Iso Data — isoorbi-package
title: isoorbi: Process Orbitrap Iso Data — isoorbi-package
text: First generation tool process data Orbitrap Iso mass spectrometers. Citation: doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.1c00944 .

title: isoorbi: Process Orbitrap Iso Data — isoorbi-package
text: Maintainer: Caj Neubauer caj.neubauer@colorado.edu (ORCID) [copyright holder] Authors: Sebastian Kopf sebastian.kopf@colorado.edu (ORCID) Kristýna Kantnerová kristyna.kantnerova@colorado.edu (ORCID)

title: Assign the base peak — orbi_basepeak
text: orbi_basepeak() assigns one isotopocule data frame base peak

title: Assign the base peak — orbi_basepeak
code: orbi_basepeak(dataset, basepeak)

title: Assign the base peak — orbi_basepeak
text: dataset data frame IsoX output. Needs contain columns filename, compound, scan., isotopocule, ions.incremental. basepeak isotopocule used base peak orbi_calculate_ratio()

title: Assign the base peak — orbi_basepeak
text: Input data frame plus two columns called Basepeak Basepeak.Ions

title: Assign the base peak — orbi_basepeak
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package = "isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>%                      orbi_simplify_isox() %>%                      orbi_basepeak(basepeak = "M0")

title: Calculate the results table — orbi_calculate_results
text: Contains logic generate results table

title: Calculate the results table — orbi_calculate_results
code: orbi_calculate_results(dataset, ratio.method)

title: Calculate the results table — orbi_calculate_results
text: dataset processed data frame IsoX output ratio.method Method  computing ratio; passed orbi_calculate_ratio()

title: Calculate the results table — orbi_calculate_results
text: Returns table containing filename, compound,  Basepeak, Isotopocule, Ratio, Ratio.SEM, relSE.permil, Shot.Noise.permil, ..Scans, Mins..1mio

title: Calculate the results table — orbi_calculate_results
text: Description options ratio.method: mean: arithmetic mean ratios individual scans. sum: sum ions numerator across scans divided sum ions observed denominator across scans. geometric.mean: geometric mean ratios individual scans. slope: ratio calculated using slope linear model weighted numerator x, using stats::lm(x ~ y + 0, weights = x). weighted.sum: weighing function ensures scan contributes equal weight ratio calculation, .e. scans ions Orbitrap contribute disproportionally total sum x y used calculate x/y.

title: Calculate the results table — orbi_calculate_results
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package = "isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>%       orbi_simplify_isox() %>% orbi_basepeak(basepeak = "M0")  %>%       orbi_calculate_results(ratio.method = "sum")

what: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
title: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
text: Remove extremely high low intense scans based TIC x Injection time orbi_filter_TICxIT()

title: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
code: orbi_filter_TICxIT(dataset, truncate_extreme)

title: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
text: dataset Simplified IsoX file TICxIT outliers removed truncate_extreme number 0 10. Remove percentage scans based TIC multiplied injection time.

title: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
text: Filtered data frame (tibble)

title: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
text: orbi_filter_TICxIT() function removes scans outliers. TIC multiplied injection time serves estimate number ions Orbitrap. filter basic truncation removed x % scans maximal x % scans minimal ion estimates. Grouping filename compound.

title: Filter to remove extreme scans — orbi_filter_TICxIT
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package = "isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>% orbi_simplify_isox() %>% orbi_filter_TICxIT(truncate_extreme = 1)

what: Basic filtering of IsoX data — orbi_filter_isox
title: Basic filtering of IsoX data — orbi_filter_isox
text: basic filter function orbi_filter_isox() file names, isotopocules, compounds time ranges

title: Basic filtering of IsoX data — orbi_filter_isox
code: orbi_filter_isox(   dataset,   filenames,   isotopocules,   compounds,   time_min,   time_max )

title: Basic filtering of IsoX data — orbi_filter_isox
text: dataset data frame filtered filenames Vector file names select isotopocules Vector isotopocules select compounds Vector compounds select time_min Minimum time minutes time_max Maximum time minutes

title: Basic filtering of IsoX data — orbi_filter_isox
text: Filtered data frame (tibble)

title: Basic filtering of IsoX data — orbi_filter_isox
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package = "isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>% orbi_simplify_isox() %>% orbi_filter_isox(filenames = c("s3744"), compounds = c("HSO4-"), isotopocules = c("M0"), time_min = 0, time_max = 1)

what: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
title: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
text: Remove minor signals (e.g., satellite peaks) reported IsoX

title: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
code: orbi_filter_satellitePeaks(dataset)

title: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
text: dataset data frame tibble produced IsoX data orbi_simplify_isox()

title: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
text: Filtered data frame (tibble)

title: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
text: orbi_filter_satellitePeaks() function removes minor signals isotopocule reported IsoX. often small satellite peaks generated Fourier transform. signal high intensity many signals, can indicate m/z tolerance setting used processing .raw files IsoX incorrect.

title: Filter to remove minor satellite peaks — orbi_filter_satellitePeaks
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package = "isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>% orbi_simplify_isox() %>% orbi_filter_satellitePeaks()

title: Filter weak isotopocules — orbi_filter_weak
text: Remove isotopocules consistently detected across scans orbi_filter_weak()

title: Filter weak isotopocules — orbi_filter_weak
code: orbi_filter_weak(dataset, min_percent)

title: Filter weak isotopocules — orbi_filter_weak
text: dataset simplified IsoX data frame processed min_percent number 0 90. Isotopocule must observed least percentage scans (relative observed isotopocule compound)

title: Filter weak isotopocules — orbi_filter_weak
text: Filtered data frame (tibble)

title: Filter weak isotopocules — orbi_filter_weak
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package = "isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>%                      orbi_simplify_isox() %>%                      orbi_filter_weak(min_percent = 2)

title: Read IsoX file — orbi_read_isox
text: Read IsoX output file (.isox) tibble

title: Read IsoX file — orbi_read_isox
code: orbi_read_isox(filepath)

title: Read IsoX file — orbi_read_isox
text: filepath Path .isox file

title: Read IsoX file — orbi_read_isox
text: data frame containing minimum columns named filename, scan., time.min, compound, isotopocule, ions.incremental, tic, .ms

title: Read IsoX file — orbi_read_isox
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_DualInlet_small.isox", package="isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath)

title: Simplify IsoX output — orbi_simplify_isox
text: Keep columns directly relevant isotopocule ratio analysis

title: Simplify IsoX output — orbi_simplify_isox
code: orbi_simplify_isox(dataset)

title: Simplify IsoX output — orbi_simplify_isox
text: dataset loaded IsoX data simplified

title: Simplify IsoX output — orbi_simplify_isox
text: data frame containing 8 columns: filename, scan., time.min, compound, isotopocule, ions.incremental, tic, .ms.

title: Simplify IsoX output — orbi_simplify_isox
code: fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package="isoorbi") df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath) %>% orbi_simplify_isox()
